EntryName	A0A8V8TNN2_HUMAN
ProteinName	DNA-directed RNA polymerase III subunit RPC3 (RNA polymerase III subunit C3)
GeneName	POLR3C
Length	323
Function	DNA-dependent RNA polymerase catalyzes the transcription of DNA into RNA using the four ribonucleoside triphosphates as substrates. Specific core component of RNA polymerase III which synthesizes small RNAs, such as 5S rRNA and tRNAs.
